title.rendered: Job at Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School and College in 2024

content.rendered:
Job at Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School and College in 2024. Gujranwala’s Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School & College is one of Pakistan’s prestigious educational institutions. Various teaching and administrative positions are currently available at the school.

We are currently seeking qualified and experienced teachers for a variety of departments, including Mathematics, English, Science, Urdu, Social Studies, Computer Science, Physics, Chemistry, Biology, and Islamic Studies.

The Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School & College is also seeking candidates to fill administrative positions such as Principal, Vice Principal, Librarian, and Clerk. Salary ranges from 35000 to 45000 rupees per month.

Contact Us to Publish Your Jobs Ads At statesaga.com

Job at Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School and College in Gujranwala in 2024

Date Posted: 17 August, 2024
Last Date: 06 October, 2024
Category: Government
Newspaper: Dunya Jobs
Education: MA, M.sc
Location: Gujranwala, Punjab, Pakistan
Organization: Divisional Public School & College of Quaid e Azam
Job Industry: Education Jobs
Job Type: Full Time

Latest Job In August 2024

  • Islamabad Exim Bank Job in 2024
  • NASTP Jobs in Islamabad, 2024
  • Job At Balochistan Wheels Limited In Karachi In August 2024

The Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School & College in Gujranwala, Pakistan invites applications for the position of school head and academic coordinator. An advertisement inviting applicants for the position was published in the Dunya Newspaper on August 17, 2024. It is necessary to have an MA, M.Sc, or equivalent degree.

Several Education jobs and other Government jobs at Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School & College will be closing around October 6, 2024. See the exact ad for more details. Here’s how to apply for one of the latest jobs at Quaid e Azam Divisional Public School & College.

Teaching Job Application Process

Find out how to apply for teaching jobs at Quaid e Azam Public School & College, from submission requirements to interview procedures. Prepare a compelling teaching portfolio and demonstrate your passion for education.
